subtitles.text: Check the members' academic ability in six subjects: major subjects at the junior high school level and general entertainment common sense questions.
The member with the lowest total score will be the 4th brain king!
What are you doing with the batteries?
I've only ever changed the battery.
That's what most people do, isn't it?
I used to put them vertically.
I don't know what time the batteries were used.
You already thought this would work.
It's interesting that you put it up.
It's hard to bet on the full name, isn't it?
I know his face. It's Kishida-san.
I couldn't even think of Kishida-san at first.
I wrote it down to tell you that I know who he is.
I wrote it to let you know who it was.

I was hoping you could help me figure out the correct answer.

But you knew Mitsuharu from Misawa.
And the next one is great.
I wrote all the names in kanji.
The question about Prime Minister Kishida earlier.
Why did he write his full name in kanji?
I've been meaning to ask you.
Let me tell you one thing.
There's a reason why you can't cheat.
I was alone with Okayo when I took the test.
So I can't see his answers.
Tamura, why do you love money so much?
Why is money such a big deal?
I was just talking to my family recently.
Okay, well, here's the next question.
You hear it all the time in the news.
Make a correct sentence using the word "inbound".
You understand, don't you, Mr. Himura?
In short, foreign tourists come to Japan.
I want you to make a correct sentence.
I want you to make sentences that include inbound consumption.
Oh, you want me to make a sentence?
Something about the ball going inbounds.
When I heard "bounce", I thought it was a ball.
You know, like in basketball, there's a rebound.
I lost because it bounced inside like that.
Hey, they said inbound is a foul.
He said inbound is a foul.
So they've been doing it all this time.
You have a lot of teachers this time.
Why are you acting like such a jerk?
Yakiniku is twice as good when inbound to rice
Is that what you mean by inbound?
I didn't know it was called "inbound".
I really want to give you a pass!
I have to get two receipts due to the inbound system.
I actually said this answer pretty well.
I mistook it for an invoice.
That's why everyone thinks they're right, but they're wrong.
Next, let's look at this one.
The Black Ships' arrival in Japan

In short, there are a lot of dummy words in this question.
So, please use only the words that explain the arrival of the black ships.
The Going Merry... that's the ship Luffy was on.
Perry came to Japan on a black ship to open the country to the outside world.

That's why Perry's the only one who uses them.
We're all very anxious about this.
Perry came to Japan on the Going Merry.
The Going Merry is a ship that appears in One Piece.
What kind of reaction is that?
I've never read a single volume of the manga in my life.
I've never read a single volume of the manga.
I thought he must have really come on board

MacArthur came aboard the Going Merry with guns.
Well, I just took what I thought was necessary.

No, I understand. I know about the Black Ships.
Why did you all think you'd be invited?
Xavier came over from Peru with Perry.
The sword hunting system allowed foreigners to use guns in Japan.
First, Xavier comes from Peru on a penny.
What penny did you get on?
I thought it was a ride called a penny.
I thought I'd better spend a lot of pennies.
I'm still confused by the fact that it's a penny ride.
But I could tell that Going Merry Go was different.
